Talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're in the mood to chat, there are
plenty of other travelers here.<sp:0:4:0>See the ones riding on wagons? Those
are traveling merchants.<sp:0:4:0>If you're in the market for anything, you
might get it at a bargain by asking around.
Greeting_Noon_M_P:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm having a drumming showdown with
the setting sun to see whose passion
burns brighter.
Talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're in the mood to chat, there are
plenty of other travelers here.<sp:0:4:0>Anyone dressed in that Cece-brand stuff
is guaranteed to know lots about clothes.<sp:0:4:0>If you're ever having trouble with your
outfit, you could do worse than to ask one
of them.
Greeting_Morning_M_P:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm having a drumming showdown with the
sun to see which of us is more on fire.
Talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're in the mood to chat, there are
plenty of other travelers here.<sp:0:4:0>The ones with the impressive equipment
are with the Zonai Survey Team.<sp:0:4:0>They're looking into any odd goings-on
caused by the Upheaval, as well as those
ruins that have been raining from the sky.<sp:0:4:0>If you're curious about anything you see
in this area, odds are they're the experts.
Greeting_Evening_M_P:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm having a drumming showdown with the
moon to see which of us shines brighter.
Talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Though if you walk up to them looking like
that, I don't know whether they'd talk or
lock you up so they can study you.
Greeting_Morning_M_P_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Couldn't resist my beats, huh? Don't feel
bad. No one can.
Greeting_Snow_M_P:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I was having a drumming showdown with
the snow to see which of us is cooler.
Greeting_Rain_M_P:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I was having a drumming showdown with
the rain to see who could pound out a
rhythm fastest.
Talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_01>Oh, hey! <sp:5:1:0>You seem like a man on
the move.<sp:0:4:0>It's a shame we've never gotten to
perform with you.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>But we're short on instruments, so...hmm.<sp:5:1:0>
Oh, I know! <sp:5:1:0>You could be our vocalist.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>With our heartfelt rhythm and your
strong, clear voice...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_01>We'd REALLY shake up these stables!
